page.title: 09BATLEY SPORTS AND LIBRARY
page.content: Nearly every Sunday we go to{Batley {Sports Centre.}There are two swimming pools, one large, one small. There is a weight training room, three squash courts, a multi-purpose room, and big hall for Judo. There is a badminton court and tennis court outside. After we have been swimming we go upstairs to the cafe. There is a bar and a snooker table next to the cafe. If you go onto the balcony you can see both swimming pools. In{Batley Library }there is a computer which you can book time to play on. There are two microfiche readers to help find the book you want. You can also borrow video tapes, pictures and records. There is a reading room in the library containing newspapers and magazines. Upstairs is an art gallery and at the other end is a reference library where you can study.
